title: WATCHLIST: Rob Riggle, True Detective S3 Teaser, HBO 2019 Compilation Preview, Yellowstone and more
description:
Rob Riggle joins to talk about Step Brothers outtakes and his new show Ski Master Academy on Sony Crackle. The Watchlist for this week includes HBO's 2019 preview, True Detective S3 teaser, Magic For Humans, Big Little Lies,  #OnTheList: Jack Ryan #offTheList: The Sinner. What are you watching? 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
